title: Industry Work
subtitle: Professional Experience
disambiguation: This article covers the professional work experience of [Aneesh Kumar](/). For his personal projects, see [Aneesh Kumar (Projects)](/projects).

content.text: Working as a Platform Engineering Intern at Quantifind, a leading provider of risk analytics and consumer insights solutions for financial services and retail industries.
Worked as a Software Engineering Intern at Oracle, contributing to enterprise software solutions and database technologies.
